description: Manage throughput of Gremlin graph under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput migrate
commands.summary: Migrate the throughput of the Gremlin Graph between autoscale and manually provisioned.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput migrate --account-name
                                             --database-name
                                             --name
                                             --resource-group
                                             --throughput-type {autoscale, manual}

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput show
commands.summary: Get the throughput of the Gremlin graph under an Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin database.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput show --account-name
                                          --database-name
                                          --name
                                          --resource-group

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput update
commands.summary: Update the throughput of the Gremlin graph under an Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin database.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb gremlin graph throughput update --account-name
                                            --database-name
                                            --name
                                            --resource-group
                                            [--max-throughput]
                                            [--throughput]
